title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, April 2, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss describes skirmishes with Federal forces. He also discusses his new position in the army and gives brief details about the battle of Kernstown.
keywords: Troop Movement, Military Strategy, Military Authority, Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Prisons/Prisoners, Women, Arts/Leisure, Camp Life, National Government, American Civil War
